title: No train service between Dhoby Ghaut and Harbour Front due to power fault

updates.text: [CORRECTION] Passengers affected by CCL disruption on 25 Oct may seek a refund by 7 Nov at all SMRT MRT stations.
[CCL] service between PayaLebar and HarbourFront running normally. No service between Paya Lebar to Dhoby Ghaut & Paya Lebar to Marina Bay
[CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #PayaLebar and #HarbourFront are now running normally.
[CCL] UPDATE: No train service between #DhobyGhaut and #HarbourFront due to power fault for about 1 hour.Buses are being arranged.
[CCL]No train service between #DhobyGhaut and #HarbourFront due to power fault. Please seek alternative transport. Buses are being arranged.
